sub_title: Policy Advisor and Researcher @ ARQ International & Editorial Assistant @ Intervention Journal
summary: Experienced in qualitative research, policy design/advise, fieldwork and project management. Strong intercultural communication, coordination and analytical skills. Initiator, passionate about people and adept in working in different contexts such as South Africa, Malawi, Sierra Leone, Ghana and Kenya. Skilled in, and passionate about feeding academic knowledge into field work strategies and vice versa.
